h2_title: Where to use the Blood Stained Needle in Black Myth: Wukong
content: The Blood-Stained Needle is automatically used during The Duskveil fight at the end of the Purple Cloud Mountain secret area in The Webbed Hollow. During the fight, it will become the Weaver's Needle, one of the more powerful Vessels in the game.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Blood_Stained_Needle.md', within the main section titled 'Blood Stained Needle', specifically from the subsection 'Where to use the Blood Stained Needle in Black Myth: Wukong'.
The content is as follows:
The Blood-Stained Needle is automatically used during The Duskveil fight at the end of the Purple Cloud Mountain secret area in The Webbed Hollow. During the fight, it will become the Weaver's Needle, one of the more powerful Vessels in the game.
